cause.description:
we humans DO NOT deserve this planet. if you think that we do, then F#CK YOU!!! its time to get rid of all the rubbish that has accumulated on this wonderful planet - all two legged, meat eating, fur and leather and wool wearing, "life is for living - so lets kill an animal" bullshit thinking people of the world. if you want, we can start with me. i will be the first to give up my life for the greater good that is mother nature.
1. humans suck
2. humans stink
3. ALL HUMANS SHOULD DIE!!!!!!!!!!
cause.mission: create awareness about the selfish, greedy and inhumane acts of human beings
cause.name: F#CK ALL HUMANS! KILL US ALL!!
